Package

Summary
Package
clThe ClueLib package.

cl

package cl

The ClueLib package.  All library files are included in this package.  A class declared within the package can be accessed using one of the following:

  • The class scope resolution operator ::
int i = cl::choice#(int)::min( 1, 2 );
  • An explicit import declaration
import cl::choice;
int i = choice#(int)::min( 1, 2 );
  • A wildcard import
import cl::*;
int i = choice#(int)::min( 1, 2 );
package cl
The ClueLib package.
